data.text: Esiae nye nyagblɔɖi ɖe Damasko ŋu:
Woagblẽ Aroa ƒe duwo ɖi woatsi ƒuƒlu,
Efraim ƒe mɔ sesẽwo nu ayi
“Eva eme le ɣe ma ɣi be,
Azu abe bligble si me woŋe bli
Kutsetse ʋɛ aɖewo asusɔ abe ale si ne wogbe amiti vɔ,
Ɣe ma ɣi la, amegbetɔ atrɔ ɖe eƒe Wɔla ŋu,
Le ŋkeke ma dzi la, woƒe du sesẽ siwo wogblẽ ɖi na Israelviwo hesi dzo la anɔ abe gbegbe ene, eye woazu aƒedo.
Elabena èŋlɔ Mawu, wò xɔnametɔ la be,
togbɔ be gbe si gbe nèdoe la,
Togbɔ be ameawo le hoo wɔm
Ŋɔdzi nɔa anyi le fiẽ me, gake wobuna ne ŋu ke.
